feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA1/SGP1][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 29, 21:00 UTC  -  Nov 30, 00:00 UTC

entry.title: [EU][Dedicated Servers] - Dedicated server reboot
entry.content:
Nov 20, 15:04 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 20/11/2023 10:40 UTC
End time : 20/11/2023 11h57 UTC
Root cause : Software malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 20, 13:36 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Nov 20, 12:05 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 20/11/2023 10:40 UTC
Service impact : The service to reboot dedicated servers is unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Boot Firmware Maintenance
entry.content:
Nov 14, 11:14 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 14, 10:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 8, 01:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/11/2023 10:00 UTC
End time : 14/11/2023 10:59 UTC
Service impact : This maintenance affect reboots to disk or in rescue mode for servers running very old hardware.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our servers, we will be changing the boot firmware of legacy boot servers in RBX3 from SYSLINUX to iPXE.
